example.eg: Rope is handy when you're backpacking.
example.egtrans: 当你背包旅行时，绳子很有用。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有用的, 派得上用场的

example.eg: The company has a handy on-site child care facility.
example.egtrans: 该公司内部有一个便当的托儿设施。

example.eg: Phil always kept his phone handy in case his wife called.
example.egtrans: 菲尔总是把手机放在近便的地方，以防妻子打电话过来。

example.eg: George is pretty handy and doesn't usually need to call a professional when something breaks in his house.
example.egtrans: 乔治有双巧手，当家中出现故障时，通常不需要打电话给专业人士。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 技艺娴熟的, 手巧的

example.eg: Jeff is handy with a paintbrush, and sells his paintings online.
example.egtrans: 杰夫善于绘画，并在网上贩卖自己的作品。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 善于使用, 对...得心应手

example.eg: I always keep paper clips in my wallet; you never know when they'll come in handy.
example.egtrans: 我总是在钱包里放几个回形针，你也说不准哪天它们就派上用场了。

example.eg: Steve has always been handy at car mechanics.
He is handy at fixing broken electric motors.
